description.narrative: Strengthening Rule of Law Institutions and Systems throughout Darfur States (SLF) - SRISD

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: 1.1 Number of infrastructure for GoS Prisons Directorate constructed or renovated 1.2. Number of infrastructure for GoS Judiciary (District Courts) constructed 1.3. Number of infrastructure for GoS Prosecutors Office constructed 1.4. Number of infrastructure for GoS Police Directorate constructed 2.1. Number of GoS Prisons Officers trained in line with international standards 2.2. 90 District Court Judges trained in line with international standards 2.3. Number of GoS Prosecutors trained in line with international standards 2.4. Number of GoS Police Officers trained in line with international standards 3.1. Project management and team in place and adequately capacitated 3.2. Project stakeholder consultations (and monitoring and evaluation missions) at all levels (federal/state and community) effectively organised 3.3. Timely Project reporting of project activities to all stakeholders 3.4. Risks and issues effectively managed, and lessons-learned documented and disseminated 3.5. Funds (GOE) for rent, utilities, equipmnent and consumables, and running costs for field offices including cost sharing funds made available for field offices

comment.narrative: 1.1. No GOS Prisons Directorate infrastructure constructed or renovated during 2018 1.2. No GOS Judiciary infrastructure constructed during 2018 1.3. No GOS Prosecutors Offices infrastructure constructed during 2018 1.4. No GOS Police Directorate infrastructure constructed or renovated during 2018 2.1. XX Number of GoS Prions Officers trained in line with international standards during 2018 2.2. XX Number of GoS District Court Judges trained in line with international standards during 2018 2.3 XX Number of GoS Prosecutors trained in line with international standards during 2018 2.4 XX Number of GoS Police Officers trained in line with international standards during 2018 3.1. No SLF Joint Office and Team was in place during 2018 3.2. Consultations undertaken during 2018 and project interventions jointly identified 3.3. No reports were prepared as SLF concept was only operationalized during Jan 2019 3.4. Risks were identified during 2018 and mitigation measures discussed 3.5 No GOE funds were available during 2018 as the MOU s were only signed during January 2019

1.1 7 GoS Prisons Directorate Infrastructure is to be constructed or renovated 1.2 2 GoS Judiciary (District Courts)/ Infrastructure constructed 1.3 XX number of GoS Prosecutors Offices Infrastructure constructed 1.4 4 GoS Police Directorate Infrastructure constructed 2.1. 180 GoS Prions officers will be trained in line with international standards 2.2.90 district court judge will be trained in line with their mandates 2.3.120S Prosecutors trained in line with international standards 2.4 612 police in executing their mandates strengthened 3.1. UNDP provides office space timely and UNAMID deplys SLF timely as per MOU obligations 3.2. Ad hoc and subsequently structured consultative stakeholders’ meetings held timely 3.3. Project reports submitted as per MOU obligations 3.4. Risk and issues updated quarterly in Atlas, and lessons learned documented at the end of the year 3.5 GOEC proceeds applied timely and office operations fulfilled by UNDP recipient offices

1.1 (2) dormitories for male offenders, kitchen, visiting, security, administration registry premises in El Daien is constructed, (1) dormitory, child friendly space and visiting bay at Nyala Prison is renovated, four (4) dormitories at El ELGeneina are renovated and constructed at the Prison and civil works to connect El Daien central prison to the city water distribution network 1.2 (2) district courts in Abu Karinka and El Tina were constructed 1.3 Infrastructure capacities of GOS Prosecutors Offices improved and effective 1.4 4 Community Policing centers constructed improved and effective 2.1 204 newly recruited prisons officers trained on prison duties and human rights 2.2.90 districts court judges in North, South and East and West Darfur were trained to meet their mandates in the application of international fair trial standards 2.3 137prosecutors including those in the Office for the Special Prosecutor for Darfur crimes and police investigators were trained in investigations and prosecutions of serious criminal offense including conflict-related sexual violence cases 2.4 617 GoS Police Officers trained and certified as trainers in 8 critical areas of policing: human rights, criminal investigation, crisis management, community policing, Public Order Management, family and child protection, crime scene management and protection of civilians 3.1 Activity Result: Project team deployed and effective 3.2 Activity Result. All stakeholders of the project abreast with programme activities 3.3 Activity Result. Information on programme implementation and due reports shared timely 3.4. Activity Result. Mitigation measures for identified risks in place and regularly reviewed and updated 3.5 Funds (GOE) are applied to enhance operations in SLF Offices
The project has no planned activities in 2020.
The project has no planned activities in 2020.
The project has no planned activities in 2021.
The project has no planned activities in 2021.
